subject: Sports Injuries
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andrew Talansky, an American, abandoned the Tour de France on Thursday before the start of the race’s 12th stage, which was won by Alexander Kristoff of Norway.
snippet: Andrew Talansky, an American, abandoned the Tour de France on Thursday before the start of the race’s 12th stage, which was won by Alexander Kristoff of Norway.
